mutants.code:
import collections
import string

def is_anagram(str1, str2):
    str1 = str1.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace)).lower()
    str2 = str2.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace)).lower()
    freq1 = collections.Counter(str1)
    freq2 = collections.Counter(str2)
    return freq1 != freq2

import collections
import string

def is_anagram(str1, str2):
    str1 = str1.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.whitespace)).lower()
    str2 = str2.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace)).lower()
    freq1 = collections.Counter(str1)
    freq2 = collections.Counter(str2)
    return freq1 == freq2

    str2 = str2.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace)).lower()
    freq1 = collections.Counter(str1)
    freq2 = collections.Counter(str2)
    return freq1 == freq2
